name: contingency_common_interest_disclosures_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will you remove the Common Interest Disclosures contingency?
label: Common Interest Days
description: Regardless of your answer, you will always have up to 5 days after receiving a document to review it.
tips: Review HOA and common interest documents carefully to understand community rules and restrictions.
small_print: This will be largely dependent on when the seller provides these documents, but regardless of when they are received, you will have a minimum of 5 days to review.

internal.notes: Days until common interest disclosures contingency removal

contingency_common_interest_disclosures_.name: contingency_common_interest_disclosures_days

suggested.hint: Anything less than 10 days or more than 17 days is not advised.

contingency_common_interest_disclosures_.tooltip: Enter the number of days for common interest disclosures review
